summary: Dawne C. Miller was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). The documents available are payroll and certification reports that list her name, salary, and employment dates. She was employed by the SCAS at least from April 1978 to December 1978. The documents do not specify her role within the committee.
significance: Dawne C. Miller's significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating her involvement in the investigation, though her specific role is not detailed in these documents.
